channel.title: Comments on: alarm:clock euro: VC Scarcity For Irish Tech

item.title: By: Joe Drumgoole
item.dc:creator: Joe Drumgoole
item.description: Well on the good news front both Delta and NCB are in the process of raising 100m euro funds. However TVC has withdrawn completely from the Tech Sector as part of its transition to a private equity company.
item.content:encoded: Well on the good news front both Delta and NCB are in the process of raising 100m euro funds. However TVC has withdrawn completely from the Tech Sector as part of its transition to a private equity company.
